import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; // Pour navigation React Router export default function Header() { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); const nav = [ { name: "Accueil", path: "/" }, { name: "Modèles", path: "/templates" }, { name: "Aide", path: "/help" }, ]; return (
{/* Logo + Nav gauche */}
{/* Nav links desktop */}
{nav.map((item) => ( {item.name} ))}
{/* Boutons connexion / inscription à droite */}
Se connecter S'inscrire
{/* Mobile menu button */}
); }
